title: Predicting stock returns by XGBoost
description: We are going to use XGBoost regressor to predict the stock returns in the following two days. I did not see much notebook here. Let me know if it is unproper to post this note. The key ideas in this work are (1) using XGBoost to preselect the ten most important features to fight overfitting, (2) using the linear loss function instead of the conventional square loss function. The final model consistently outperforms the all-zero predict. In my test, the model also performed better than the median prediction and could rank 30th in the private leaderboard.
